GK16bhakavpu:591: %% This pāda of sragdharā lacks the yati after the first seven syllables
GK16bhakavpu:592: (sragdharā should have a caesura after each group of 7 syllables).

GK16bhakavpu:761: (viz. pakṣa and sapakṣa) and in 1 thing (viz. vipakṣa).

GK16bhakavpu:817: jāmadagnyaṃ yudhā jitvā sā jñeyā kopabādhinī // Bh_5.44 //

GK16bhakavpu:922: tasya cādhigame yatnaḥ kāryaṃ kāvyaṃ vidhitsatā /

GK16bhakavpu:939: tasmātkūṭastha ityeṣā śābdī vaḥ kalpanā vṛthā /
GK16bhakavpu:944: vyavahārāya lokasya prāgitthaṃ samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // Bh_6.13 //
GK16bhakavpu:947: vinaśvaro 'stu nityo vā sambandho 'rthena vā satā /
GK16bhakavpu:948: namo 'stu tebhyo vidvadbhyaḥ pramāṇaṃ ye 'sya niścitau // Bh_6.15 //
GK16bhakavpu:955: janako gavi gobuddher mṛgyatāmaparo dhvaniḥ // Bh_6.17 //
GK16bhakavpu:957: apavādavidhijñāne phale caikasya vaḥ katham // Bh_6.18 //

GK16bhakavpu:968: prayoktuṃ ye na yuktāśca tadviveko 'yamucyate // Bh_6.23 //
GK16bhakavpu:970: tulyārthatve 'pi hi brūyāt ko hantiṃ gativācinam // Bh_6.24 //
GK16bhakavpu:971: śrautrādiṃ na tu durbodhaṃ na duṣṭādimapeśalam /

GK16bhakavpu:995: yathā vidvānadhīte 'sau tiṣṭhadgu ca vahadgu ca // Bh_6.35 //
GK16bhakavpu:999: akena ca na kurvīta vṛttiṃ tadgamako yathā // Bh_6.37 //
GK16bhakavpu:1000: pañcarājīti ca yathā prayuñjīta dviguṃ striyām /

GK16bhakavpu:1004: tṛtīyaikavacaḥ ṣaṣṭhyām āmantaṃ ca vadet kvipi /

GK16bhakavpu:1035: lyuṭaṃ ca kartṛviṣayaṃ devano ramaṇo yathā // Bh_6.50 //

GK16bhakavpu:1043: tataśchamiṣṭyā ca yathā sārvaḥ sarvīya ityapi // Bh_6.53 //
GK16bhakavpu:1051: inacca phalabarhābhyāṃ phalino barhiṇo yathā // Bh_6.56 //
